briefTitle: A Human Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Fermented Turmeric in Subjects Showing Mild Hepatic Injury
summary: The investigators performed a double-blind parallel study in a group of showing mild hepatic injury subjects who were given Fermented turmeric over a period of 12 weeks. The investigators measured liver function parameters , including ALT(Alanine Transaminase), AST(Aspartate Transaminase), ALP(Alkaline Phosphatase), Î³-GT(Gamma-Glutamyl Transferase), and serum bilirubin, and monitored their blood pressure.
